RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MACHINE GUN MAN was hustled to the early lead, was challenged half way down the backstretch and shared command around the far turn but edged clear at the top of the stretch and won going away. CLARESTOWN was off the pace in the two path around the first turn then moved up to force the pace around the far turn but was no match for the winner. COFFEE COUNTY was forwardly placed down the backstretch then made a mild three wide bid on the far turn but lacked the late response needed. MOTAWAAFEQ saved ground down the backstretch then moved between horses on the final turn to be best of the rest. BONUS APPRECIATION was allowed to settle around the first turn then moved up from three wide to improve position. BARAHIN was hustled along early to be placed off the pace and faded after a half. WITCH'S VOW remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: Motawaafeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, between horses, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Coffee County
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, mild bid, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, shared command, edged clear, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Clarestown
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, forced pace, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 6, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERTHOUGHT went to a pressured lead down the backstretch then edged away after a half and drew off. EAST LEX broke inward and bumped APPLEWOOD at the start, trailed the field through the final turn then moved out to six wide for a late rally for the place. BODE'S LIGHT had to check slightly on the first turn then was allowed to settled down the backstretch moved out to five wide in upper stretch to make a late run and was up for the show. APPLEWOOD was bumped by EAST LEX at the start then was allowed to settle down the backstretch, made a three wide bid on the final turn but was empty in the stretch. TAPPED OUT forced the pace from the two path and weakened after a half. FOOLISH DREAMS floated out slightly going into the first turn then dropped to the rail in the middle of the first turn, settled in the middle of the pack down the backstretch but was never a threat. LATE NITE MISCHIEF vied for the lead from the three path to the half pole and faded. SOCIAL AFLEET was five wide into the first turn then stalked the pace from four wide down the backstretch, moved in to three wide on the final turn but gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: East Lex
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, bumped, trailed, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Overthought
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured lead, edged away, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked slightly, allowed to settle, 5wupper, late run

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out first turn, dropped to rail, mid pack, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 6, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUSTOM BLUE GRASS was off the pace then slipped through at the seven sixteenths pole to take the lead, drifted out in the stretch but kept on for the win. ANDIAMO GIACOMO sprinted away from the gate and dueled for the lead from the two path to the half pole but proved to be a clear second. STEALING APRIORITY raced near the back while saving ground, showed late interest at the top of the stretch and held the show. SADIE'S LIGHT raced near the back to the turn then made a three wide bid to improve position. COLT'S BRIM vied for the lead from between horses to the nine sixteenths pole and dropped back. GUTZY was rushed up to share command to the half pole and gave way. THE JOCKEY OF ANDIAMO GIACOMO CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF CUSTOM BLUE GRASS FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN LATE STRETCH, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO CHANGE WAS MADE.

ENTRY.NAME: Gutzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, shared command, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Stealing Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, saved ground, late interest, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, slipped through, led, drifted out, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVD Classic S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 113. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate and start, $600 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $1,200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition book s take structure payout percentages per field size. Weight: Three Year Olds 120 lbs., Older 125 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 at a mile or over since February 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., such a race of 25,000 in 2023 6 lbs., such a race other than maiden,c laiming, or starter in 2023 9 lbs. Preference to horse with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owners will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into the race will cancel all fees. Tropp hy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUCHUPONASTAR pressed the pace around the first turn then took command with six furlongs left and drew away to prove much the best. DOUBLE STAR tracked the leaders from off the rail down the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the final turn but was no match for the winner. HIGHLAND CREEK was off the pace in the two path around the first turn then moved up entering the final turn and was out kicked in the stretch. BEHEMAH STAR saved ground down the backstretch then moved out to four wide on the final turn but never made a serious bid. CALCULATED set the early pace around the first turn then was allowed to settle down the backstretch and was out run.

ENTRY.NAME: Calculated
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, allowed to settle, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Touchuponastar
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Double Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, off rail, 3wbid, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Highland Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, moved up, out kicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD THREE YEAR OLDS, 118 LBS.; OLDER, 123 LBS. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY MASTER was five wide into the first turn then stalked the pace from the two path, made a three wide bid on the final turn and fought gamely in the stretch but veered in in the final jumps causing TSURIS to steady but was able to hold on for the win. TSURIS vied for the lead from the two path then took the lead at the three furlong pole drifted out slightly at the top of the stretch and fought gamely inside of PLAY MASTER in the drive but had to steady late. KAT'S SOLDIER raced near the back around the first turn then moved up from four wide at the half pole, tipping out to five wide in upper stretch and proved to be best of the rest. ST PIERRE saved ground while racing in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then moved up from two wide on the final turn, moved out to six wide in upper stretch for a late run to improve position. CREOLE REB hopped at the start and bumped with CUSTOM DANCER then raced back down the backstretch moved out to three wide to make a bid on the final turn but was not enough. KATS PICK was always back. RICKY RIGHT was hustled to a pressured lead to the three eighths pole and tired. GLITTER STORM tracked the leaders down the backstretch but was not a threat. CUSTOM DANCER was off the pace in the three path to the five furlong pole and slowly retreated. AN STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED ALONG WITH A JOCKEY OBJECTION, THE JOCKEY OF TSURIS CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF PLAY MASTER FOR INTERFERENCE NEARING THE WIRE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS ALLOWED AND PLAY MASTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST TO SECOND FOR INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH.

ENTRY.NAME: St Pierre
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, 6wupper, late run, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Kat's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 4w1/2p, 4-5w stretch, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Tsuris
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, led 3/8p, drift out upper, gamely, steadied late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Play Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w1st, stalked pace, 3w2nd, fought gamely, veered in, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ragin Cajun S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 83. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEARS OLD. Free to nominate with $300 to enter and $300 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition boo k stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: 122 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since January 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter s ince March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race in 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race can cels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MACHO BEANIE was off the early pace then moved up from three wide at the three eighths pole and engaged the leader at the five sixteenths pole and matched strides down the stretch but was determined and won the nod. ALLNIGHT MOONLIGHT went to the front from the inside to set most of the pace, was headed at the five sixteenths pole and drifted out slightly leaving the turn but fought gamely in the stretch but was denied. LATE SEPTEMBER was away alertly then vied for the lead from the two path to the quarter pole and gave way. DUE TO AN TIMER MALFUNCTION THE RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Allnight Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace, headed 5/16p, drifted out, gamely, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Beanie
ENTRY.OWNER: Oak Tree Stables LLC (Powell and O'Brien)
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w3/8p, engaged 5/16p, match strides, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Late September
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied for lead, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 6, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming P rice $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEAU was close up early then split rivals at the seven sixteenths pole to take the lead then was headed at the three sixteenths pole and dug in to hold on. SCRAPPY ARTIE was within striking distance from four wide, moved to engage the leader at the three sixteenths pole and fought gamely outside of leader but was denied. A SONG FOR ARCH had no speed early, moved out to six wide in upper stretch for a late rally to be up for the show. WILD BERT had no early speed but made a rail bid to improve position. HALF AGAIN vied for the lead from three wide to the top of the stretch and tired. DANCIN WITH ANGELS was off the pace on the inside but failed to menace. GOLD PUNCH had good early speed to the three furlong pole and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin With Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Seau
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, split rivals, led mid turn, dug in, held on

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hill 'n' Dale Equine Holdings, Inc. & Glen Hill Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Bert
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, rail bid, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: King Creole S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 99. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $300 to enter and $300 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided per co ndition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 118 lbs. Older 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since January 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., a rac e other than maiden, claiming or starter since March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race in 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK SWORD broke outward at the start then vied for the lead from four wide to the half pole, then made a rebid from three wide in upper stretch and drew clear in the stretch. X CLOWN dueled for the lead from the three path, stayed on gamely in the stretch and held the place. BIG CHOPPER had an awkward start spotting the field several lengths, gained momentum on the turn while moving out to four wide at the three sixteenths pole for a late rally to be up for show. BERTIE'S GALAXY dueled for the lead from two wide then edged away on the turn and fought gamely in the stretch but was out finished late. RELENTLESS DANCER tracked the leaders to the turn then moved up from two wide on the turn, moving out to three or four wide in the stretch but was empty. NO PEDIGREE vied for the lead from the inside to the half pole and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Bertie's Galaxy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2w, edged away, gamely, out finished late

ENTRY.NAME: X Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G

ENTRY.NAME: Black Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, vied for lead, rebid, 3wupper, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINISHWHATUSTARTED vied for the lead from three wide early then dueled from two wide on the turn and down the stretch and proved best. FIRE VISION had good speed then dueled on the turn and down the stretch but couldn't hold of the winner and proved second best. PORTO DEL ACE had no early speed then moved up from three wide on the turn and moved out to six wide in upper stretch and had a late surge for the show. LA VIE EN ROUGE had a brief early foot then was placed off the pace on the turn and was game down the stretch but was out kicked late. HIGHER NOTE was forwardly placed on the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the turn and was out finished in the stretch run. SWAMP ROCK was off the pace on the inside but failed to menace. ELLA'S BABY raced near the back early then moved to three wide on the turn and angled in at the three sixteenths pole to improve position. SWEETHEART VISION was slightly fractious in the gate then raced back to the turn, made a mild bid but was not a factor. STARRY STARRY DAY saved ground to no avail. HERECOMESGOODBYE showed little. LADY KRISTEN raced in the middle of the pack then moved out to three wide at the three eighths pole and out farther to five wide in upper stretch but was no a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetheart Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, mild bid, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Swamp Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: La Vie En Rouge
ENTRY.OWNER: Boutte Lynne M and Epstein Ellen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, off pace, gamely, out kicked late
